title: Pasion de Cristo y el proposito de nuestra vida
description: In his personal style, the renowned preacher Adrian Rogers leads us back to Jesus' death on the cross, the crucial turning point in the history of mankind and the key to the Christian faith. His reflections on the passion of Christ will touch all those who are desirous of obtaining a deeper understanding of the cross and what it means for them. This book contains a masterly presentation of the nature of Christ's atoning sacrifice.
author: Adrian Rogers
